mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Good Judgement", "Cloning of a Caller", "Area Callers Training", "Callerlab's Educational Fund", "Learning to Prompt and Teach Contras", "Tools for Calling", "Guidelines for Grading", "Calllers School Listings", "Tips for Wheelchairers", "Island Chain", "Let's Go Square Dance Camping" and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "The Callers Notebook", "Discovery", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Contra Corner", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Ammunition", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
